Pure Lift Gyms

Welcome to Pure Lift Gyms, where your fitness comes first. Please contact us for pricing tailored to your fitness needs, and discounts available on request.

Contact

About

Training

Enjoy working out and building muscle in our friendly gym. We pride ourselves on having the best equipment in the city. Come visit!

Gym Machine

Use our gym machines and build muscle while losing weight. We have a wide range of machines for targeting that specific muscle.

Excersise

Come alone or with a friend. Our studio section will always have enough room to do your press-ups, crunches, sit-ups & squats.

Classes

With classes running all throughout the week, from Yoga to Boxcercise. We will get the blood pumping through your veins.

Founded in 2002, we have always done our best to offer a professional environment for you to come and work out. Our personal trainers are happy to work one-on-one with clients to develope excercise plans, provide guidance, and motivate you to acheive your fitness goals.
